sqlMap.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS WHERE TRANS_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND TRANS_DEAL_MAIN = 'R' AND TRANS_CONDITION IN ('001', '002', '003', '004', '005')) AS REQ_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR TS WHERE (CASE WHEN (SELECT TP.TRANS_CONDITION FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS TP WHERE TP.TRANS_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND TP.TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = TS.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TP.TRANS_DEAL_MAIN = 'R' AND TP.TRANS_CONDITION = '006') = '006' THEN '거래완료' WHEN (SELECT COUNT(TP.TRANS_SEQ) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS TP WHERE TP.TRANS_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND TP.TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = TS.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TP.TRANS_DEAL_MAIN = 'R' AND TP.TRANS_CONDITION = '001') = (SELECT COUNT(TP.TRANS_SEQ) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS TP WHERE TP.TRANS_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND TP.TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = TS.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TP.TRANS_DEAL_MAIN = 'R') THEN '거래실패' ELSE '교섭중' END) = '교섭중' AND TS.SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND 0 < (SELECT COUNT(TP.TRANS_SEQ) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS TP WHERE TP.TRANS_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND TP.TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = TS.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TP.TRANS_DEAL_MAIN = 'R' AND TP.TRANS_CONDITION != '000') ) AS REQ_CNT005, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR WHERE SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND SELL_CAR_STEP = '1') AS REQ_CNT006 FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR GROUP BY REQ_CNT
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_008_SELL_CAR( SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ, SELL_CAR_REG_NO, SELL_CAR_DEAL_TYPE, SELL_CAR_PRICE, SELL_CAR_COMP, SELL_CAR_MDL, SELL_CAR_GRD, SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD, SELL_CAR_OPEN_YM, SELL_CAR_COLOR, SELL_CAR_TRSMS, SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND, SELL_CAR_MILEAGE, SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND, SELL_CAR_CC, SELL_CAR_FUEL, SELL_CAR_OPT_SAFE, SELL_CAR_OPT_CONV, SELL_CAR_OPT_AV, SELL_CAR_FEATURE, SELL_CAR_TRB_YN, SELL_CAR_TITLE, SELL_CAR_CONTENT, SELL_CAR_USER_NAME, SELL_CAR_USER_EMAIL, SELL_CAR_USER_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR_DTL, SELL_CAR_USER_ZIP_CD, SELL_CAR_USER_ADDR_CD, SELL_CAR_STEP, SELL_CAR_MEMO, SELL_CAR_STATE_YN, SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, SELL_CAR_CHG_DATE) VALUES( #sellCarUserSeq#, #sellCarRegNo#, #sellCarDealType#, #sellCarPrice#, #sellCarComp#, #sellCarMdl#, #sellCarGrd#, #sellCarDtlGrd#, #sellCarOpenYM#, #sellCarColor#, #sellCarTrsms#, #sellCarDoorKind#, #sellCarMileage#, #sellCarEngineKind#, #sellCarCC#, #sellCarFuel#, #sellCarOptSafe#, #sellCarOptConv#, #sellCarOptAV#, #sellCarFeature#, #sellCarTrbYN#, #sellCarTitle#, #sellCarContent#, #sellCarUserName#, #sellCarUserEmail#, #sellCarUserPhone#, #sellCarUserComp#, #sellCarUserCompPhone#, #sellCarUserCompAddr#, #sellCarUserCompAddrDtl#, #sellCarUserZipCD#, #sellCarUserAddrCD#, #sellCarStep#, #sellCarMemo#, #sellCarStateYN#, NOW(), NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT SELL_CAR_SEQ FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR ORDER BY SELL_CAR_REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT COUNT(TS.SELL_CAR_SEQ) FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR TS WHERE TS.SELL_CAR_REG_NO = #strSequance#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBL_008_SELL_CAR SET SELL_CAR_DEAL_TYPE = #sellCarDealType#, SELL_CAR_PRICE = #sellCarPrice#, SELL_CAR_COMP = #sellCarComp#, SELL_CAR_MDL = #sellCarMdl#, SELL_CAR_GRD = #sellCarGrd#, SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD = #sellCarDtlGrd#, SELL_CAR_OPEN_YM = #sellCarOpenYM#, SELL_CAR_COLOR = #sellCarColor#, SELL_CAR_TRSMS = #sellCarTrsms#, SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND = #sellCarDoorKind#, SELL_CAR_MILEAGE = #sellCarMileage#, SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND = #sellCarEngineKind#, SELL_CAR_CC = #sellCarCC#, SELL_CAR_FUEL= #sellCarFuel#, SELL_CAR_OPT_SAFE= #sellCarOptSafe#, SELL_CAR_OPT_CONV = #sellCarOptConv#, SELL_CAR_OPT_AV = #sellCarOptAV#, SELL_CAR_FEATURE = #sellCarFeature#, SELL_CAR_TRB_YN = #sellCarTrbYN#, SELL_CAR_TITLE = #sellCarTitle#, SELL_CAR_CONTENT =#sellCarContent#, SELL_CAR_USER_NAME = #sellCarUserName#, SELL_CAR_USER_EMAIL = #sellCarUserEmail#, SELL_CAR_USER_PHONE = #sellCarUserPhone#, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP = #sellCarUserComp#, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_PHONE = #sellCarUserCompPhone#, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR =#sellCarUserCompAddr#, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR_DTL = #sellCarUserCompAddrDtl#, SELL_CAR_USER_ZIP_CD = #sellCarUserZipCD#, SELL_CAR_USER_ADDR_CD = #sellCarUserAddrCD#, SELL_CAR_CHG_DATE = NOW() WHERE SELL_CAR_SEQ = #sellCarSeq#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TEMP2.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1) AS ROWNUM, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_SEQ, 0) AS SELL_CAR_SEQ, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ, 0) AS SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ, SELL_CAR_REG_NO, SELL_CAR_DEAL_TYPE, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_PRICE, 0) AS SELL_CAR_PRICE, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE1) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_COMP ) AS SELL_CAR_COMP, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE3) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_MDL ) AS SELL_CAR_MDL, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE4) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_GRD ) AS SELL_CAR_GRD, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE5) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ) AS SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD, SELL_CAR_OPEN_YM, SELL_CAR_COLOR, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_GEARSHIFT' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_TRSMS ) AS SELL_CAR_TRSMS, SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND, SELL_CAR_MILEAGE, SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_CC, 0) AS SELL_CAR_CC, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_FUEL' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_FUEL ) AS SELL_CAR_FUEL, SELL_CAR_OPT_SAFE, SELL_CAR_OPT_CONV, SELL_CAR_OPT_AV, SELL_CAR_FEATURE, SELL_CAR_TRB_YN, SELL_CAR_TITLE, SELL_CAR_CONTENT, SELL_CAR_USER_NAME, SELL_CAR_USER_EMAIL, SELL_CAR_USER_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR_DTL, SELL_CAR_USER_ZIP_CD, SELL_CAR_USER_ADDR_CD, SELL_CAR_STEP, SELL_CAR_MEMO, SELL_CAR_STATE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, '%y/%m/%d') AS SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, SELL_CAR_CHG_DATE, (SELECT ATTACH_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_008_ATTACHFILE WHERE ATTACH_SELL_SEQ = SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS ATTACHFILE , (SELECT COUNT(*)-(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS WHERE TRANS_CONDITION!='000' AND TRANS_DEAL_MAIN='S' AND TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ=SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ ) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_008_BUY_CAR) AS TEMP3 WHERE (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = '' )) AND (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP != 3 AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP!=4 ) )AS MATCHING,
(SELECT COUNT(*) - ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS WHERE TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TRANS_DEAL_MAIN='S' ) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_008_BUY_CAR) AS TEMP3 WHERE (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = '' )
AND (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP != 3 AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP!=4 )
) )AS NEW_MATCHING
FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR SC, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq# AND SELL_CAR_STEP != 4 AND SELL_CAR_STEP != 3 ORDER BY SELL_CAR_SEQ DESC ) TEMP2 WHERE ROWNUM > #startCount# AND ROWNUM <= #lastCount#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR WHERE SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ = #sellCarUserSeq#

SELECT SELL_CAR_SEQ, BUY_CAR_SEQ FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR SC,TBL_008_BUY_CAR BC WHERE SELL_CAR_SEQ=#sellCarSeq# AND (BC.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR BC.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR BC.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR( BC.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = '' AND BC.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = '' AND BC.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = '' ) AND BC.BUY_CAR_STEP != 4 AND BC.BUY_CAR_STEP != 3 )

SELECT TEMP2.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1) AS ROWNUM, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_SEQ, 0) AS SELL_CAR_SEQ, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ, 0) AS SELL_CAR_USER_SEQ, SELL_CAR_REG_NO, SELL_CAR_DEAL_TYPE, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_PRICE, 0) AS SELL_CAR_PRICE, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE1) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_COMP ) AS SELL_CAR_COMP, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE3) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_MDL ) AS SELL_CAR_MDL, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE4) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_GRD ) AS SELL_CAR_GRD, (SELECT DISTINCT(VALUE5) FROM TBL_008_CAR_CODE CC WHERE CC.CODE = SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ) AS SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD, SELL_CAR_OPEN_YM, SELL_CAR_COLOR, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_GEARSHIFT' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_TRSMS ) AS SELL_CAR_TRSMS, SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND, SELL_CAR_MILEAGE, SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND, IFNULL(SELL_CAR_CC, 0) AS SELL_CAR_CC, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_FUEL' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_FUEL ) AS SELL_CAR_FUEL, SELL_CAR_OPT_SAFE, SELL_CAR_OPT_CONV, SELL_CAR_OPT_AV, SELL_CAR_FEATURE, SELL_CAR_TRB_YN, SELL_CAR_TITLE, SELL_CAR_CONTENT, SELL_CAR_USER_NAME, SELL_CAR_USER_EMAIL, SELL_CAR_USER_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_PHONE, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR, SELL_CAR_USER_COMP_ADDR_DTL, SELL_CAR_USER_ZIP_CD, SELL_CAR_USER_ADDR_CD, SELL_CAR_STEP, SELL_CAR_MEMO, SELL_CAR_STATE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, '%y/%m/%d') AS SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, SELL_CAR_CHG_DATE, (SELECT ATTACH_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_008_ATTACHFILE WHERE ATTACH_SELL_SEQ = SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS ATTACHFILE , (SELECT COUNT(*)-(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS WHERE TRANS_CONDITION!='000' AND TRANS_DEAL_MAIN='S' AND TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ=SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_008_BUY_CAR) AS TEMP3 WHERE (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR (TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = '' AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = '' )) AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP != 3 AND TEMP3.BUY_CAR_STEP!=4
)AS MATCHING,
(SELECT COUNT(*) - ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_008_TRANSACTION_PROGRESS WHERE TRANS_SELL_CAR_SEQ = SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ AND TRANS_DEAL_MAIN='S' ) FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_008_BUY_CAR) AS TEMP4 WHERE (TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = CASE WHEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD != 'NULL' THEN SC.SELL_CAR_DTL_GRD ELSE SC.SELL_CAR_GRD END
OR (TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL1 = '' AND TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL2 = '' AND TEMP4.BUY_CAR_MDL3 = '' )
AND (TEMP4.BUY_CAR_STEP != 3 AND TEMP4.BUY_CAR_STEP!=4 )
) )AS NEW_MATCHING
FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR SC, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE SELL_CAR_SEQ = #sellCarSeq# AND SELL_CAR_STEP != 4 AND SELL_CAR_STEP != 3 ORDER BY SELL_CAR_SEQ DESC ) TEMP2

SELECT (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_GEARSHIFT' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_TRSMS ) AS SELL_CAR_TRSMS, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_DOORS' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND ) AS SELL_CAR_DOOR_KND, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_ENGINE' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND ) AS SELL_CAR_ENGINE_KND, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_FUEL' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_FUEL ) AS SELL_CAR_FUEL, (SELECT VALUE1 FROM TBL_008_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_CATEGORY = 'CD_CAR_FEATURE' AND CD.CODE_KEY = SC.SELL_CAR_FEATURE ) AS SELL_CAR_FEATURE, SELL_CAR_REG_DATE, SELL_CAR_REG_NO, (SELECT ATTACH_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_008_ATTACHFILE WHERE ATTACH_SELL_SEQ = SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS ATTACHFILE FROM TBL_008_SELL_CAR SC WHERE SC.SELL_CAR_SEQ = #seq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBL_008_SELL_CAR SET SELL_CAR_STEP=#sellCarStep# WHERE SELL_CAR_SEQ = #sellCarSeq#
